title: Fastest supercomputers - number of computer cores 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location, and Number of cores in each Location on the y axis.
Location Sunway TaihuLight  China has the highest Number of cores and Lassen United States has the lowest Number of cores.
The maximum Location Sunway TaihuLight  China has got 36.94 times higher Number of cores than the minimum Location Lassen United States.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location, and Number of cores in each Location on the y axis.
The maximum Number of cores 10649600.0 is found at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China and the minimum is found at Lassen United States where Location is 288288.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location, and Number of cores in each Location on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of cores for 10 number of Locations.
Location Sunway TaihuLight  China has the highest Number of cores and Lassen United States has the lowest Number of cores.
The highest Location Sunway TaihuLight  China has 10361312.0 more Number of cores than the lowest Location Lassen United States.
Number of cores at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China is 10649600.0 , second place is Tianhe-2A China at 4981760.0, and thirdly is Summit United States at 2414592.0.
The Location Lassen United States has 4.75 times less Number of cores than average.
Summing up the values of all Locations, we get total 22419648.0.
